thread.title: 15 Child Stars Who Passed Away Too Soon (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: 15 Child Stars Who Passed Away Too Soon (PHOTOS)

author: Zoe Jewell
title: 15 Child Stars Who Passed Away Too Soon (PHOTOS)
text:
The Diff'rent Strokes star died from a brain hemorrhage when he was just 42. Gary Coleman 
The Diff'rent Strokes star died from a brain hemorrhage when he was just 42. Lee Thompson Young The Disney star, who was suffering from bipolar disorder, committed suicide when he was 29. Lee Thompson Young 
The Disney star, who was suffering from bipolar disorder, committed suicide when he was 29. Anton Yelchin The young actor, best known for his role in the Star Trek films, died in a freak accident after his car pinned him to a brick pillar outside his home. He was 27. Anton Yelchin Advertisement 
The young actor, best known for his role in the Star Trek films, died in a freak accident after his car pinned him to a brick pillar outside his home. He was 27. Heather O’Rourke Best known for her roles in Steven Spielberg's Poltergeist films, the young star died when she was 12 from cardiac arrest while in surgery to repair an acute bowel obstruction. Heather O’Rourke Advertisement 
Best known for her roles in Steven Spielberg's Poltergeist films, the young star died when she was 12 from cardiac arrest while in surgery to repair an acute bowel obstruction. River Phoenix Joaquin Phoenix’s older brother, who was a very talented actor and musician, died of a drug overdose at 23 years old. River Phoenix Advertisement 
Joaquin Phoenix’s older brother, who was a very talented actor and musician, died of a drug overdose at 23 years old. Brittany Murphy Though she had her breakout role in Clueless , Brittany began working when she was a young child on TV sitcoms. She died at 32 from pneumonia. Brittany Murphy Advertisement 
Though she had her breakout role in Clueless , Brittany began working when she was a young child on TV sitcoms. She died at 32 from pneumonia. Dana Plato Another Diff’rent Strokes star, Dana passed away when she was 34 from a drug overdose. Dana Plato Advertisement 
Another Diff’rent Strokes star, Dana passed away when she was 34 from a drug overdose. Corey Haim The teen actor starred in many famous films, including Firstborn with Robert Downey Jr. and Sarah Jessica Parker, and Lucas with Winona Ryder. He sadly died from a pulmonary congestion at just 38. Corey Haim Advertisement 
The teen actor starred in many famous films, including Firstborn with Robert Downey Jr. and Sarah Jessica Parker, and Lucas with Winona Ryder. He sadly died from a pulmonary congestion at just 38. Michelle Thomas The Family Matters star sadly passed away from cancer when she was 29. Michelle Thomas 
The Family Matters star sadly passed away from cancer when she was 29. Matthew Garber Best known for his role in Mary Poppins , the British star died when he was 21 from pancreatitis. Matthew Garber Advertisement 
Best known for his role in Mary Poppins , the British star died when he was 21 from pancreatitis. Paul Walker The Fast and the Furious star began acting when he was a child in shows like Highway to Heaven . The beloved actor died when he was just 40 in a terrible car accident Paul Walker Advertisement 
The Fast and the Furious star began acting when he was a child in shows like Highway to Heaven . The beloved actor died when he was just 40 in a terrible car accident Rob Knox After starring in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince , the English actor was stabbed to death outside a bar in London when he was 18. Rob Knox Advertisement 
After starring in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince , the English actor was stabbed to death outside a bar in London when he was 18. Josh Ryan Evans The actor, who starred on the soap opera Passions , was born with a rare disease that prevented his body from growing. He passed away at 20 years old due to a heart condition. Josh Ryan Evans Advertisement 
The actor, who starred on the soap opera Passions , was born with a rare disease that prevented his body from growing. He passed away at 20 years old due to a heart condition. Jonathan Brandis The teen heartthrob had guest appearances on One Life to Live and starred on NBC’s seaQuest DSV . He died when he was 27 after hanging himself. Jonathan Brandis Advertisement 
The teen heartthrob had guest appearances on One Life to Live and starred on NBC’s seaQuest DSV . He died when he was 27 after hanging himself. Skye McCole Bartusiak The young star played Mel Gibson’s daughter in The Patriot . Sadly, she passed away when she was 21 from a drug overdose. Skye McCole Bartusiak Advertisement 
The young star played Mel Gibson’s daughter in The Patriot . Sadly, she passed away when she was 21 from a drug overdose.
